description:
Lightweight replacement of Lenovo Vantage for Lenovo Legion laptops.

Lenovo Legion Toolkit (LLT) is a utility created for Lenovo Legion laptops, that allows changing a couple of features that are only available in Lenovo Vantage or Legion Zone.
Release Notes
- Added FPS, 1% Low, and Frame Time to the Floating Gadget.
- Added a Custom feature to the Floating Gadget.
- Added PawnIO detection to the Floating Gadget.
- Added a Simple style for the Floating Gadget.
- Added ITSMode notification.
- Added ITSMode status in the tray Status Window.
- Hide Geek Mode on other laptop models.
- Resolved an issue that caused errors when the Server update method was executed.
- Resolved an issue where .NET 8 was installed instead of .NET 9 during the LLT installation process.
- Resolved an issue that resulted in invalid CPU Utilization calculations.
- Resolved an issue where reading CPU Power was sometimes invalid.
- Re-enabled the warranty feature on Chinese models.
Full Changelog: https://github.com/XKaguya/LenovoLegionToolkit/compare/v2.26.9.7...v2.26.9.8
